row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS ! run book to compare two keys in registry :SET &KEYS# = "" :IF &UC4RB_REG_OPTION_KEYVALUE# <> "" : SET &KEYS# = '/v "&UC4RB_REG_OPTION_KEYVALUE#"' :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_REG_OPTION_DEFAULT# <> "" : SET &KEYS# = "/ve" :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_REG_OPTION_OUTPUT_ALL# <> "" : SET &KEYS# = "&KEYS# /oa" :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_REG_OPTION_OUTPUT_DIFFS# <> "" : SET &KEYS# = "&KEYS# /od" :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_REG_OPTION_OUTPUT_MTCH# <> "" : SET &KEYS# = "&KEYS# /os" :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_REG_OPTION_NO_OUTPUT# <> "" : SET &KEYS# = "&KEYS# /on" :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_REG_OPTION_ALL_SUBKEYS# <> "" : SET &KEYS# = "&KEYS# /s" :ENDIF
@echo off ! Compare two keys %SYSTEMROOT%\system32\reg.exe COMPARE "&UC4RB_REG_KEY#" "&UC4RB_REG_KEY_DST#" &KEYS# set returncode=%errorlevel% if %returncode% EQU 0 ( echo Successfully compared key &UC4RB_REG_KEY# with &UC4RB_REG_KEY_DST# ) else ( echo Error occurred whilst comparing key &UC4RB_REG_KEY# with &UC4RB_REG_KEY_DST#. ) exit /b %returncode%
